Text: Enjoy & SEED :)
Each Windows edition is about 2.5 GB - 3 GB . How did you combine the above 6 editions ( 15 - 18 GB ) into mere 3.72 GB ?

Read torrent description... there are 3 editions:
-Windows 7 Ultimate x86 / x64
-Windows 7 Professional x86 / x64
-Windows 7 HomePremium x86 / x64

Ultimate contains all the lower editions, so it isn't getting bigger by adding Pro and HP to it, but if you add 32 + 64 bit it will get a bit bigger because not all the files are the same in the different versions.

for fast download:

1. klik on the button with for the wifi
2. run the test
3. enable the settings
4. disable DTH
5. klik on options
6. klik on the tap bandwidth
7. disable all global rate limit options
8. klik on the tap Bittorrent/Utorrent ( just what sort of program you use )
9. disable DHT network, DHT for new torrents, bandwidth management [uTP], limit local peer bandwidth
10. enjoy the fastest possible download ( for all torrents )
